title: Ukraine Cease-Fire Brings End To 5 Months Of Violence
teaser: After almost five months of conflict, the Ukrainian government and pro-Russian separatists have signed a truce to end the fighting. More than 2,600 people have died in the violence between the two sides, and hundreds of thousands have been forced from their homes.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
